personalInfo.name: Isha Narola
personalInfo.title: Senior Software Engineer
personalInfo.summary: Experienced Senior Software Engineer with 2.5+ years of expertise in ReactJS and NextJS development. Proven track record of building scalable web applications with modern JavaScript frameworks, state management solutions, and RESTful API integrations. Strong background in full-stack development with excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently or as part of a team.

responsibilities: Developed scalable web applications using ReactJS and NextJS
Implemented state management solutions with Redux and Context API
Built responsive UI components with modern design systems
Integrated RESTful APIs and real-time data solutions
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in agile environments
achievements: Implemented AWS cloud solutions with 99.9% uptime
Mentored junior developers and led code reviews

projects.title: ESAI Work
projects.description: Comprehensive administrative web application with advanced data visualization capabilities
features: Dual UI interfaces for external and internal users with role-based access control
Dynamic reporting system with multi-feature tables supporting search, filtering, sorting, and data export
Built responsive UI components from Figma designs with multilingual support (English & Japanese)
User Role Management System
Advanced Search and Filtering Mechanisms
Excel Data Export Functionality
Candidate Profile Management
Multi-language Localization

projects.title: RECOUPLE
projects.description: Energy management and data visualization platform for organizational metrics
features: Implemented AWS Cognito authentication with multi-factor authentication (MFA) including Google integration
Developed complex contract management system with date validation and overlap prevention
Built dynamic resource management with emission factors and economic life calculations
Profile Dashboard with Data Records Management
Scenario Planning with Target and Opportunity Management
Project Management with Revenue Tracking
Comprehensive Settings Panel with User/Permission Management
Site Management with GPS-based Asset Tracking

projects.title: Shipnavi
projects.description: Full-featured e-commerce platform with bidding functionality
features: Developed comprehensive product management system with variants and categories
Built secure checkout process with multiple payment and shipping options
Created user authentication system with wishlist and purchase history tracking
Optimized for performance, browser compatibility, and responsive design
Implemented bidding functionality for products

projects.title: Techeeta
projects.description: Game analytics platform with real-time sensor data integration
features: Real time Data handler based on socket - Insider Cloud
Intense & inspirit based sensor connection
Assign sensor to player and Get real time data based on device
Create various tracker such as Replay, Football tracker, performance, Distance tracker
Trends analysis as well as heart rate monitoring
Login with firebase with verify email address
Performance analysis such as chart overview
Multi-language Localization
Sessions management for all teams
Heart Rate tracker, Distance tracker implement based on live data
Football tracker based on each player's position with the time range

internships.description: Gained hands-on experience in software development practices and methodologies
Developed Android applications using Java and Android Studio. Learned mobile app development lifecycle and best practices

academicProjects.title: Gift Recommendation Website
academicProjects.description: Developed a collaborative web platform with a team of 5 members. Created recommendation engine for gift suggestions based on relationships. Implemented user-friendly interface for easy gift discovery and selection.

academicProjects.title: ExamPaper Management System
academicProjects.description: Built digital repository for exam question papers with permanent database storage. Developed categorization system by subject, exam type, branch, and semester. Enabled easy upload and retrieval functionality for faculty and students.
